snippet: The charges against three Navy officials and a ship-servicing contractor have embarrassed military leaders and raised questions about lax oversight.
abstract: Bribery charges against Navy Commander Jose Luis Sanchez, two other Navy officials and a ship-servicing contractor have embarrassed top Navy officials and raised questions about lax oversight; widening probe by federal prosecutors in San Diego cites lavish gifts.
lead_paragraph: The charges against three Navy officials and a ship-servicing contractor have embarrassed military leaders and raised questions about lax oversight.

headline.main: Records Cite Lavish Gifts in Navy Bribery Case
headline.print_headline: Records Cite Lavish Gifts In Navy Bribery Case

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
